Description: Gabled limestone stela of Theodore; Greek text; representations of palm-branches and a pomegranate.
Bibliographic references: Hall 1905 / Coptic and Greek Texts of the Christian Period from Ostraka, Stelae, etc. in the British Museum (p.136, Pl.98)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: I.Brit.Mus.Gr. I 98:1 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2007)
